title: Architect Designed Super Luxury House For Immediate Sale
details:
Super Luxury House at Mabola, Wattala for immediate sale.
Close proximity to Kerawalapitiya Interchange
2 minutes to Colombo - Negombo Main Road ( 700 m from home)
10 Perches Architect Designed
4 Bedrooms (Air Conditioned)
Master Bedroom with attached Bathroom
3 Separate Bathroom Mezzanine Floor ( American Stranded ) with water heater,
Balcony 2 halls and 2 kitchens and TV lobby etc....
Underground and Rooftop Water Tanks
CCTV Security System
1 Vehicle Parking with Roller Gate ample parking in the road.
Calm and Safe Neighborhood (Doctors Engineers and High Professionals)
Price is negotiable best offers are welcome. please make an appointment before visiting.
